data.name: NotifyIcon_NotRunning
data.comment: Tooltip for notify icon when Growl is not running

data.name: About_BuildNumber
data.comment: About tab: build number information - Placeholder {0} is the actual build number

data.name: About_FindInformationLabel
data.value: 以下のリンク先にはディスプレイや拡張、アップデートがあります:

data.name: About_GrowlVersion
data.comment: About tab: name and version - Placeholder {0} is the actual version number

data.name: About_OriginalLabel
data.value: 原案、インスピレーション、ロゴ:

data.name: AddComputer_FormTitle_Forward
data.comment: Add Computer form title - when fowarding

data.name: AddComputer_FormTitle_Subscriptions
data.comment: Add Computer form title - when subscribing

data.name: AddComputer_ManualAdd
data.value: [以下のリストに存在しない場合は 手動で追加する場合にはここをクリックして下さい。]
data.comment: Add Computer form: click to add a computer not detected by Bonjour

data.name: Applications_AllNotifications
data.comment: Applications tab: list item for application-wide preferences

data.name: Applications_NoAppsRegistered
data.value:
アプリケーションはまだ登録されていません。
通知を行う有効なGrowlアプリケーションが登録された場合、それらは左側のリストに表示されカスタマイズ出来る様になります。
data.comment: Applications tab: shown when no applications are registered

data.name: Applications_RemoveApplication
data.value: アプリケーションを削除
data.comment: Applications tab: 'Remove Applications' context menu item

data.name: DefaultPreference_Name
data.comment: The name displayed for the '[Default]' preference option

data.name: FailedToStart_Caption
data.value: Growlを開始する事が出来ませんでした
data.comment: MessageBox caption shown if Growl fails to start

data.name: FailedToStart_Message_GNTP
data.value:
GrowlのTCPポート({0}) を使用しているリスナが既に存在しています。
別のバージョンのGrowlが起動中の場合は、それらを終了し、再度実行して下さい。
data.comment: MessageBox text shown if Growl fails to start the GNTP listener. Placeholder {0} is the port number.

data.name: FailedToStart_Message_UDP
data.value:
GrowlのUDPポート({0}) を使用しているリスナが既に存在しています。
別のバージョンのGrowlが起動中の場合は、それらを終了し、再度実行して下さい。
data.comment: MessageBox text shown if Growl fails to start the UDPlistener. Placeholder {0} is the port number.

data.name: General_ApplicationPaused
data.comment: General tab: Displayed when Growl is paused

data.name: General_ApplicationRunning
data.comment: General tab: Displayed when Growl is running

data.name: General_ApplicationStopped
data.comment: General tab: Displaysed when Growl is stopped

data.name: General_AutoStart
data.value: ログイン時に自動的にGrowlを起動する
data.comment: General tab: auto start checkbox text

data.name: General_DefaultSettingsTitle
data.comment: General tab: Default Settings group box title

data.name: General_IdleSettings_IdleAfter
data.value: アイドル中を判断する {0} 秒後
data.comment: General tab: Radio button text for 'consider me idle after x seconds' - Placeholder {0} is where the TextBox will go

data.name: General_IdleSettings_NeverIdle
data.value: アイドル中や離席中を判断しない
data.comment: General tab: Radio button text for 'never consider me idle'

data.name: General_IdleSettingsTitle
data.comment: General tab: Idle Settings group box title

data.name: History_NoNotificationsForDate
data.value: (この日の通知はありません)
data.comment: History tab: shown when sorted by date and the date had no notifications

data.name: History_SortBy_Application
data.comment: History tab: sort by application radio button label

data.name: History_SortBy_Date
data.comment: History tab: sort by date radio button label

data.name: LiteralString_Format
data.comment: The string 'format' (used in forward list view to show protocol format)

data.name: LiteralString_ReceivedAt
data.comment: The string 'Received At' (used in History for each past notification to indicate the date/time the notification was received)

data.name: LiteralString_ReceivedFrom
data.comment: The string 'Received From' (used in History for each past notification item to indicate which application sent the notification)

data.name: LiteralString_Today
data.comment: The string 'Today' (used in History view for the current day)

data.name: Loading_ApplicationList
data.value: アプリケーション一覧を読み込み中...

data.name: Loading_Display
data.value: ディスプレイ'{0}'を読み込み中 ...
data.comment: Loading progress indicator for a specific display - Placeholder {0} is the display name

data.name: Loading_Displays
data.value: ディスプレイを読み込み中...

data.name: Missed_Summary
data.value: 離席中に{0}件の未読メッセージがありました
data.comment: Missed Notifications Summary: the summary text - Placeholder {0} is the number of notifications missed.

data.name: Network_ForwardNotifications
data.value: 他のコンピュータへ通知を転送する
data.comment: Network tab: checkbox text for 'forward notifications to other computers'

data.name: Network_RemoveComputer
data.comment: Network tab: 'Remove Computer' context menu item

data.name: Network_SubscribeToNotifications
data.value: 他のコンピュータからの通知を購読する
data.comment: Network tab: checkbox text for 'subscribe to notifications from other computers'

data.name: NotifyIcon_ContextMenu_CheckForUpdates
data.comment: Notify icon context menu: Check for updates

data.name: NotifyIcon_Paused
data.comment: Tooltip for notificy icon when Growl is paused

data.name: NotifyIcon_Running
data.comment: Tooltip for notify icon when Growl is running

data.name: Protocol_Type_GNTP
data.comment: GNTP protocol name (used in forwarding dropdown, etc)

data.name: Protocol_Type_UDP
data.comment: UDP protocol name (used in forwarding dropdown, etc)

data.name: Security_AllowNetworkNotifications
data.value: ネットワーク上の通知を許可する
data.comment: Security tab: checkbox text for 'allow network notificaions'

data.name: Security_AllowSubscriptions
data.value: クライアントによる通知の購読を許可する
data.comment: Security tab: checkbox text for 'allows subscriptions'

data.name: Security_AllowWebNotifications
data.value: ウェブサイトからの通知を許可する
data.comment: Security tab: checkbox text for 'allow web notifications'

data.name: Security_PasswordManager_Edit
data.comment: Security tab: Password Manager 'Edit' context menu item

data.name: Security_PasswordManager_Instructions
data.value: パスワードを特定出来る簡単な詳細を記してパスワードを入力して下さい

data.name: Security_PasswordManager_Title
data.value: パスワードマネージャ

data.name: Security_RequirePasswordLocalApps
data.value: ローカルアプリケーションにはパスワードを必要とする
data.comment: Security tab: checkbox text for 'require password for local apps'

data.name: SplashScreen_Loading
data.comment: The loading progress indicator shown on the initial splash screen.

data.name: SplashScreen_Title
data.comment: The name of the application shown on the initial splash screen

data.name: SplashScreen_Version
data.comment: The version informatino shown on the initial splash screen. Placeholder {0} is the version number.

data.name: SystemNotification_ApplicationName
data.comment: The application name used for system notifications

data.name: SystemNotification_AppRegistered_Text
data.value: アプリケーション'{0}'が通知を送信する様に登録されました
data.comment: Notification text when an application registers. Placeholder {0} is the application name.

data.name: SystemNotification_AppRegistered_Title
data.value: アプリケーションの登録
data.comment: The title used for the system notification when an application registers

data.name: SystemNotification_ClientSubscribed_Text
data.value: クライアント'{0}'が通知の転送を購読しました
data.comment: Notification text when a client subscribes to notifications. Placeholder {0} is the subscribing client's name.

data.name: SystemNotification_ClientSubscribed_Title
data.value: クライアントが購読しました
data.comment: The title used for the system notification when a client subscribes to notifications

data.name: SystemNotification_Preview_Text
data.value: これはディスプレイスタイル'{0}'のプレビューです
data.comment: Notification text shown for preview notifications - Placeholder {0} is the actual display name

data.name: SystemNotification_Preview_Title
data.value: ディスプレイスタイルのプレビュー
data.comment: The title used for preview notifications

data.name: SystemNotification_Running_Text
data.comment: Notification text shown when Growl starts

data.name: SystemNotification_Running_Title
data.comment: The title used for the system notification when Growl starts

data.name: Updater_DownloadComplete
data.value: ダウンロード完了。インストールを開始中...
data.comment: Check for Updates form: displayed when the update has finished downloading and the installation is starting

data.name: Updater_DownloadingUpdate
data.value: 更新をダウンロード中...
data.comment: Check for Updates form: displayed while an update is downloading

data.name: Updater_GrowlIsUpToDate
data.value: Growlは最新です。現在のバージョン: {1}
data.comment: Check for Updates form: displayed when Growl is up-to-date. Placeholder {0} is any newer version number, {1} is the current up-to-date version number

data.name: Updater_UpdateAvailable
data.value: Growlのバージョン{0}が利用可能です。Growlを最新版にアップデートしますか? (最新版:{1})
data.comment: Check for Updates form: displayed when an update is available. Placeholder {0} is the newer version number, {1} is the current version number
